metadata.title: USN-3716-1 -- Dnsmasq update
metadata.description: This update adds the latest DNSSEC validation trust anchor required for the upcoming Root Zone KSK Rollover.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3716-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dnsmasq - 2.75-1ubuntu0.16.04.5 dnsmasq-utils - 2.75-1ubuntu0.16.04.5 dnsmasq-base - 2.75-1ubuntu0.16.04.5 No subscription required
